about.title: The Lab
about.description: OPORTO RUNNING LAB is a running laboratory created for those who want to run better, with more efficiency, less pain and greater consistency - regardless of experience level.
about.approach: Here, running is treated with method. We assess technique, identify limitations and correct movement patterns, combining group classes, technical training and individual training prescription adapted to each person's goals.
about.mission: Making running safer, more effective and sustainable for everyone.
